Yonkers.Brookside Cemetery (Englewood, New Jerse:
Brookside Cemetery is a historical cemetery in Englewood, New Jersey.


== History ==
It was started in May 1876, by a group of Englewood residents who purchased 6 acres (24,000 m2) of land for a cemetery. The property sits on the East side of Engle Street adjacent to Tenafly, New Jersey.
